## Marker genes

The marker genes of following lineages are visualized using violin diagrams.

| Lineage | Marker genes | Source |
| :---: | :---: | :---: |
| Hematopoietic stem cells | Slamf1, Itga2b, Kit, Ly6a, Bmi1, Gata2, Hlf, Meis1, Mpl, Mcl1, Gfi1, Gfi1b, Hoxb5 | [*Single-cell characterization of haematopoietic progenitors and their trajectories in homeostasis and perturbed haematopoiesis*](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41556-018-0121-4) |
| Multipotent progenitor | Mki67, Mpo, Elane, Ctsg, Calr | [*The bone marrow microenvironment at single-cell resolution*](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-019-1104-8) |
| Erythroid lineage | Klf1, Gata1, Mpl, Epor, Vwf, Zfpm1, Fhl1, Adgrg2, Cavin2, Gypa, Tfrc, Hbb-bs, Hbb-y | [*Single-cell characterization of haematopoietic progenitors and their trajectories in homeostasis and perturbed haematopoiesis*](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41556-018-0121-4) |
| Lymphoid lineage | Tcf3, Ikzf1, Notch1, Flt3, Dntt, Btg2, Tcf7, Rag1, Ptprc, Ly6a, Blnk | [*Single-cell characterization of haematopoietic progenitors and their trajectories in homeostasis and perturbed haematopoiesis*](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41556-018-0121-4) |
| Myeloid lineage | Gfi1, Spi1, Mpo, Csf2rb, Csf1r, Gfi1b, Hk3, Csf2ra, Csf3r, Sp1, Fcgr3 | [*Single-cell characterization of haematopoietic progenitors and their trajectories in homeostasis and perturbed haematopoiesis*](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41556-018-0121-4) |
